metadata.title: CVE-2020-0409 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In create of FileMap.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to aninteger overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-8.0 Android-8.1Android-9Android ID: A-156997193

criterions.comment: android-platform-system-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
